attributes.action: Keep driving practical and theory tests running through the lockdown period.
attributes.additional_details: Driving is essential to many key workers especially in a lockdown period. In align with schools and public transport staying running, driving tests should also.
attributes.background: Keep driving theory and practical tests running from 5th November to 2nd of December.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
